00032 void QMTopology::Cleanup()
00033 {
00034     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator iter;
00035     for(iter=_crgunits.begin(); iter!=_crgunits.end(); ++iter)
00036         delete *iter;
00037     _crgunits.clear();
00038     _mcharges.clear();
00039     Topology::Cleanup();
00040     _db_id=0;
00041 }

00049 //void QMTopology::InitChargeUnits(){
00050 
00051     if ( tools::globals::verbose ) {
00052         cout << "Initializing conjugated segments" << endl;
00053         cout << " segment[name:type] fragment[name:type:position] molecule[name:id] " << endl;
00054     }
00055     
00056     BeadContainer::iterator itb;
00057     for (itb = _beads.begin() ; itb< _beads.end(); ++itb){
00058         
00059         QMBead * bead = dynamic_cast<QMBead *>(*itb);
00060         string bead_name = bead->getName();
00061         string bead_type = bead->getType()->getName();
00062         string molecule_name = bead->getMolecule()->getName();
00063 
00064         // check if the bead (rigid fragment) is in any defined conjugated segment
00065         if ( (bead->Options()).exists("segment.name")){
00066 
00067             // type of the conjugated segment to which this fragment belongs
00068             string segment_type = (bead->Options()).get("segment.type").as<string>();
00069 
00070             // position of the bead in the conjugated segment (starts with zero internally)
00071             int bead_position = (bead->Options()).get("segment.position").as<int>();
00072             bead_position--;
00073 
00074             // name of the conjugated segment in a molecule - used to group beads (fragments)
00075             string segment_name = (bead->Options()).get("segment.name").as<string>();
00076 
00077             // check if the segment has already been created by another fragment
00078             int molecule_id = bead->getMolecule()->getId();
00079             string segment_id = boost::lexical_cast<string>(molecule_id)+":" + segment_name;
00080             QMCrgUnit * segment = GetCrgUnitByName(segment_id);
00081 
00082             // if not, create a new segment
00083             if(segment == NULL) segment = CreateCrgUnit(segment_id, segment_type, molecule_id);
00084 
00086             segment->setDouble("lambda_intra_charging", segment->getType()->getOptions()->get("echarging").as<double>());
00087             segment->setDouble("lambda_intra_discharging", segment->getType()->getOptions()->get("edischarging").as<double>());
00088             segment->setDouble("energy_intra", segment->getType()->getOptions()->get("energy").as<double>());
00089             
00090             bead->setCrg(segment);
00091             bead->setiPos(bead_position);
00092 
00093 
00094             if ( tools::globals::verbose ) {
00095               cout << " segment[" << segment_name  << ":" << segment_type  << "] "
00096                    << "fragment[" << bead_name  << ":" << bead_type << ":" << bead_position  << "] "
00097                    << "molecule[" << molecule_name  << ":" << molecule_id  << "] " << endl;
00098             }
00099         }
00100         else{ // remove the bead from the CG trajectory
00101             bead->setCrg(NULL);
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     if ( tools::globals::verbose ) {
00106         cout << " segment[name:type] fragment[name:type:position] molecule[name:id] " << endl;
00107         cout << "Done with initializing conjugated segments" << endl;
00108     }
00109 
00110 }

00112 void QMTopology::Update(Topology& cg_top)
00113 {
00114     BeadContainer::iterator iter;
00115     BeadContainer::iterator iter_cg;
00116 
00117     assert(cg_top.Beads().size() == _beads.size());
00118 
00119     setBox(cg_top.getBox());
00120     _time = cg_top.getTime();
00121     _step = cg_top.getStep();
00122 
00123     iter_cg = cg_top.Beads().begin();
00124     for(iter=_beads.begin(); iter!=_beads.end(); ++iter, ++iter_cg) {
00125         (*iter)->setPos((*iter_cg)->getPos());
00126         if((*iter_cg)->HasU())
00127             (*iter)->setU((*iter_cg)->getU());
00128         if((*iter_cg)->HasV())
00129             (*iter)->setV((*iter_cg)->getV());
00130         if((*iter_cg)->HasW())
00131             (*iter)->setW((*iter_cg)->getW());
00132         QMBead * b = (QMBead*)(*iter);
00133 
00134         if((*iter_cg)->getSymmetry() == 1) {
00135             (*iter)->setU(vec(1,0,0));
00136             (*iter)->setV(vec(0,1,0));
00137             (*iter)->setW(vec(0,0,1));
00138         }
00139 
00140         b->UpdateCrg();
00141     }
00142 }

00150 Molecule *QMTopology::AddAtomisticBeads(CrgUnit *crg, Topology * totop){
00151      
00152     mol_and_orb * atoms = crg->rotate_translate_beads();
00153     totop->CreateResidue("DUM");
00154     Molecule *mi = totop->CreateMolecule((crg)->getName());
00155     mi->setUserData(crg);   //mi->getUserData<CrgUnit>();
00156     for (int i=0;i<atoms->getN();i++){
00157         vec pos = unit<bohr,nm>::to(atoms->GetPos(i));
00158         string atomtype = string( atoms->gettype(i) ); //+ string("-") + lexical_cast<string>(crg->getId());
00159         BeadType * bt= totop->GetOrCreateBeadType(atomtype);
00160         Bead * bead = totop ->CreateBead(1, atomtype,bt,0, 0, 0.);
00161         bead->setPos(pos);
00162         mi->AddBead(bead,"???");
00163         if(crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesNeutr()) {
00164             double charge_of_bead_neutral=crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesNeutr()->mpls[i];
00165             bead->setQ(charge_of_bead_neutral);
00166         }
00167       
00168     }
00169     delete atoms->getorbs();
00170     delete atoms;
00171     return mi;
00172 }
00173 
00174 Bead *QMTopology::CreateBead(byte_t symmetry, string name, BeadType *type, int resnr, double m, double q)
00175 {
00176     QMBead *bead = new QMBead(this, _beads.size(), type, symmetry, name, resnr, m, q);
00177     _beads.push_back(bead);
00178     return bead;
00179 }

00194 //Copy charges to either charged or neutral case
00195 
00196 void QMTopology::CopyCharges(CrgUnit *crg, Molecule *mol)
00197 {
00198     if(mol->BeadCount() != crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getN())
00199         throw std::runtime_error("QMTopology::CopyCharges: number of atoms in crgunit does not match number of beads in molecule");
00200 
00201     if(!crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesNeutr())
00202         throw std::runtime_error("QMTopology::CopyCharges: no charges defined");
00203 
00204     //loop over all beads in that molecule
00205     for (int i = 0; i < mol->BeadCount(); i++) {
00206         //get charge
00207         double charge_of_bead_i_neutral = crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesNeutr()->mpls[i];
00208         //set charge
00209         mol->getBead(i)->setQ(charge_of_bead_i_neutral);
00210     }
00211 }
00212 
00213 //Copy charges to either charged or neutral case
00214 void QMTopology::CopyChargesOccupied(CrgUnit *crg, Molecule *mol)
00215 {
00216     if(mol->BeadCount() != crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getN())
00217         throw std::runtime_error("QMTopology::CopyCharges: number of atoms in crgunit does not match number of beads in molecule");
00218 
00219     if(!crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesCrged())
00220         throw std::runtime_error("QMTopology::CopyCharges: no charges defined");
00221 
00222     
00223     if(crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesCrged()->mpls.size() == 0)
00224         throw std::runtime_error("QMTopology::CopyCharges: no charges defined (mpls.size()==0, that is strange!)");
00225 
00226     //loop over all beads in that molecule
00227     for (int i = 0; i < mol->BeadCount(); i++) {
00228         //get charge
00229         double charge_of_bead_i_charged = crg->getType()->GetCrgUnit().getChargesCrged()->mpls[i];
00230         //set charge
00231         mol->getBead(i)->setQ(charge_of_bead_i_charged);
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 QMCrgUnit *QMTopology::CreateCrgUnit(const string &name, const string &type_name, int molid)
00236 {
00237     CreateCrgUnit(_crgunits_by_id.size()+1, name, type_name, molid);
00238 }
00239 
00240 QMCrgUnit *QMTopology::CreateCrgUnit(int id, const string &name, const string &type_name, int molid)
00241 {
00242     map<int, QMCrgUnit*>::iterator iter;
00243     iter = _crgunits_by_id.find(id);
00244     if(iter != _crgunits_by_id.end())
00245         throw std::runtime_error("charge unit with id " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(id) + " already exists");
00246 
00247     if(GetCrgUnitByName(name))
00248         throw std::runtime_error("charge unit with name " + name + " already exists");
00249 
00250     QMCrgUnit *crg;
00251 
00252     CrgUnitType *type = _jcalc.GetCrgUnitTypeByName(type_name);
00253     if(!type)
00254         throw runtime_error("Charge unit type not found: " + type_name);
00255 
00256     crg = new QMCrgUnit(id, type, molid);
00257 
00258     _mcharges.insert(make_pair(name, crg));
00259     _crgunits.push_back(crg);
00260     _crgunits_by_id[id] = crg;
00261     crg->setName(name);
00262     return crg;
00263 }
